definition: essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)
article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: The offer might suit your needs either be it a boutique or a restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 一家精品店或餐馆的服务可能满足你的需求。

sentences.english: So, does it cost a lot of money to open your own boutique?
sentences.chinese: 那开自己的精品店要花很多钱吗？

sentences.english: There are also some coffee shops and boutiques that are very ritzy.
sentences.chinese: 也有一些咖啡馆和精品店是非常豪华的。

sentences.english: Her ideas to the boutique are always very down-to-earth.
sentences.chinese: 她对于这个精品店的设想总是很切合实际。

sentences.english: Our products are widely used in commercial units, hotels, boutiques, jewellery shop and interior decoration.
sentences.chinese: 广泛应用于商场，酒店，精品店，珠宝店及室内装璜。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
market/store/mall (usually specializing in a particular product category such as furniture)
